text:
DRの回答について、U社より半分くらいの回答を貰いました。 内容を確認、整理しておりますので、出来次第すぐ共有いたします。
納期について、来週に発注する場合、春節前に生産が完成出来るそうです。
２月中旬からLED搬入するようですので、春節前に全数出荷するように調整しております。( FAT時間は要相談)
trans:
Regarding the DR responses, we have received about half of the answers from Company U. We are currently reviewing and organizing the content, and will share it as soon as it is ready.
As for the delivery schedule, if the order is placed next week, production is expected to be completed before the Lunar New Year.
Since LED components are expected to arrive starting mid-February, we are working to ensure that all units are shipped before the Lunar New Year. (FAT time will need to be discussed.)
